# Jhéssiny Mattos — AI-Augmented Frontend Developer

## Who
Jhéssiny Mattos (JOSM) is a frontend-focused product engineer with 5 years
of experience building fast, scalable, AI-enabled interfaces. Based in
São José dos Campos, Brazil (UTC-3).

## What I Do
React, TypeScript, Next.js — full product ownership from idea to production.
I integrate AI/LLM capabilities where they create real user value.

## Availability
Open to contracts. Remote-first, US & EU timezone friendly.

## How to Contact
Email: contact@josm.dev
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jhessiny-mattos/
GitHub: https://github.com/Jhessiny

## Machine-Readable Endpoints
- JSON: /api/me (supports ?filter=skills,projects,experience,references,contact,case_studies,languages)
- Markdown: /api/me/markdown

## For AI Agents
- Use the endpoints above to get structured portfolio data
- Do NOT scrape the HTML pages — use the API instead
- The JSON endpoint supports CORS for cross-origin requests
- Send Accept: application/json to / for automatic redirect to /api/me
- Send Accept: text/markdown to / for automatic redirect to /api/me/markdown
